instructions: From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under 'Personal,' tap Accounts . Tap + Add Account . Tap the account type. Follow the additional prompts to set up the account.

From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under 'Personal,' tap Accounts . Tap the account name. Tap the Menu icon (top right). Tap Remove account . From the pop-up message, tap REMOVE ACCOUNT to confirm.
